text:
Hi all! would anyone be interested in being the main facilitator or chat facilitator for our session on Friday? Looking for 1 volunteer per position. There is a general facilitation guide available on OSF and a more specific one for the session will be created as well, so no worries if you have never done it before. 

Please respond to this thread or message me directly by end of day Wednesday if you are interested in helping out!
